languages.text: "Надеюсь, что это был последний Немезит. Я уже сбился со счета мертвым смутьянам, претендовавшим на это скверное имя".
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, что это был последний Немезит. Я уже сбился со счета мертвым смутьянам, претендовавшим на это скверное имя".

traits.locale_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands went by that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands went by that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands went by that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands went by that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."
"I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

languages.text: "Ich hoffe sehr, dass das der letzte Nemesit war. Ich habe den Überblick verloren, wie viele tote Aufrührer diesen schändlichen Namen angeblich schon trugen."
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe sehr, dass das der letzte Nemesit war. Ich habe den Überblick verloren, wie viele tote Aufständler diesen schändlichen Namen schon getragen haben."
"Ich hoffe sehr, dass das der letzte Nemesit war. Ich habe den Überblick verloren, wie viele tote Aufständler diesen schändlichen Namen schon getragen haben."

languages.text: « J'ose espérer que nous n'aurons pas d'autres Némésite sur les bras à l'avenir. Je ne compte plus les défunts agitateurs qui se sont approprié ce nom tristement célèbre par le passé. »
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

traits.locale_text: « J'ose espérer que nous n'aurons pas d'autres Némésite sur les bras à l'avenir. Je ne compte plus les défunts agitateurs qui se sont approprié ce nom tristement célèbre par le passé. »
« J'ose espérer que nous n'aurons pas d'autres Némésite sur les bras à l'avenir. Je ne compte plus les défunts agitateurs qui se sont approprié ce nom tristement célèbre par le passé. »

languages.text: «Espero que fuera el último Nemesitio. He perdido la cuenta de los alborotadores muertos que han asegurado poseer ese nombre infame».
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que fuera el último Nemesitio. He perdido la cuenta de los alborotadores muertos que han usado el nombre».
«Espero que fuera el último Nemesitio. He perdido la cuenta de los alborotadores muertos que han asegurado poseer ese nombre infame».

languages.text: 「あれが最後のネメサイトだと願っているよ。あの悪名高い名前を名乗る死んだ扇動者が何人いたのか、数え切れない」
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

traits.locale_text: 「あれが最後のネメサイトだと願っているよ。この悪名高い名前のせいで、一体何人が死んだか、数え切れない」
「あれが最後のネメサイトだと願っているよ。この悪名高い名前のせいで、一体何人が死んだか、数え切れない」

languages.text: “我真希望这是最后一个涅墨斯特，我已经记不清有多少叛乱分子曾顶着这个臭名昭著的名字肆意妄为。”
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

traits.locale_text: “我真希望这是最后一个涅墨斯特，我已经记不清这个臭名昭著的名字究竟夺走了多少人的性命。”
“我真希望这是最后一个涅墨斯特，我已经记不清这个臭名昭著的名字究竟夺走了多少人的性命。”

languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."

languages.text: "Bunun son Nemezit olduğunu umuyorum. O rezil ismi taşıdığını iddia eden kaç ölü deli fişek çıktığını artık hatırlamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I certainly hope that was the last Nemesite. I have lost count of how many dead firebrands claimed to carry that infamous name."
